bio.summary: Cyndi Wang is a Taiwanese pop singer and actress in Taiwanese dramas. Her real name is Wáng Jūnrú. To date she has released 8 personal albums. Cyndi's national debut was at an Avex Trax competition in Taiwan in 2003. After that she went to Japan and work there for three months. She has been invited to numerous events, including a 2008 New Year Countdown performance. The singer just signed new contracts with her new agency company DayStar Music and are currently in talks with several music record companies. Read more on Last.fm
